predictions.article: USDA Forecasts Sharpest Decline in U.S. Farm Income
predictions.prediction: US. farm income will decrease by at least 4% in 2024 compared to 2023.

predictions.article: Major agricultural export prices declined in 2023
predictions.prediction: Export volumes for U.S. wheat and soybeans will increase by at least 5% in the first quarter of 2024 as lower prices make them more competitive.

predictions.article: 2024 Farm Income Decline Confirmed in USDA Update
predictions.prediction: The number of farm bankruptcies in the U.S. will increase by at least 10% in 2024 compared to 2023.

arHeadline: Agri Causal Scan Dec 2024: Final Verification
aiBlurb: All 3 predictions for the decline in U.S. farm income, increase in wheat/Soybean exports, and increase in bankruptcies were confirmed by multiple reliable sources.
